snippet.title: JQuery Collision
snippet.description: JQuery extension to return the collisions between two selectors.

snippet.title: ColDet 3D Collision Detection
snippet.description: This library is an effort to provide a collision detection library for generic polyhedra. Its purpose is mainly for 3D games where accurate detection is needed between two non-simple objects.

snippet.title: JQuery UI Draggable Collision
snippet.description: Combines with jquery-ui-draggable 1.9.2+ and jquery-collision 1.0.2+. Provides collision events while dragging, and handles collision-avoidance. Collision and containment settings are hierarchical and extensible, allowing for complex interactions. Try it out: http://eruciform.com/jquidragcollide/

snippet.title: Xoops France
snippet.description: Publications from the Xoops France Network (translations, documentations, modules, themes, Plugin smarty, hacks, ...) - - - Publication du réseau francophone de Xoops (traductions, documentations, modules, thèmes, templates smarty, modifications,..

snippet.title: Open Dynamics Engine
snippet.description: A free, industrial quality library for simulating articulated rigid body dynamics - for example ground vehicles, legged creatures, and moving objects in VR environments. It's fast, flexible & robust. Built-in collision detection.

snippet.title: BLAST Ring Image Generator
snippet.description: BRIG is a cross-platform (Windows/Mac/Unix) application that can display circular comparisons between a large number of genomes, with a focus on handling genome assembly data. Please cite the BRIG paper if BRIG is used to generate figures for publications: NF Alikhan, NK Petty, NL Ben Zakour, SA Beatson (2011) BLAST Ring Image Generator (BRIG): simple prokaryote genome comparisons, BMC Genomics, 12:402. PMID: 21824423

snippet.title: Castle Game Engine
snippet.description: 3D game engine focused on X3D and beautiful graphic effects.

snippet.title: OpenRAVE
snippet.description: Moved to https://github.com/rdiankov/openrave An open-source, cross-platform, plugin-based robot planning environment for autonomous robotics. Includes services like collision detection, physics, (inverse) kinematics, sensors, robot controls, python bindings, and a network scripting environment.
